title: Fake F5 BIG-IP zero-day warning emails push data wipers
description: The Israel National Cyber Directorate warns of phishing emails pretending to be F5 BIG-IP zero-day security updates that deploy Windows and Linux data wipers. [...]

title: Google fixes 8th Chrome zero-day exploited in attacks this year
description: Google has released emergency updates to fix another Chrome zero-day vulnerability exploited in the wild, the eighth patched since the start of the year. [...]

title: Crypto scammers abuse X 'feature' to impersonate high-profile accounts
description: Cryptocurrency scammers are abusing a legitimate X "feature" to promote scams, fake giveaways, and fraudulent Telegram channels used to steal your crypto and NFTs. [...]

title: New phishing attack steals your Instagram backup codes to bypass 2FA
description: A new phishing campaign pretending to be a 'copyright infringement' email attempts to steal the backup codes of Instagram users, allowing hackers to bypass the two-factor authentication configured on the account. [...]

title: Ivanti releases patches for 13 critical Avalanche RCE flaws
description: ​Ivanti has released security updates to fix 13 critical security vulnerabilities in the company's Avalanche enterprise mobile device management (MDM) solution. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes Wi-Fi issues triggered by recent Windows updates
description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing Wi-Fi network connectivity problems on Windows 11 systems triggered by recently released cumulative updates. [...]

title: Healthcare software provider data breach impacts 2.7 million
description: ESO Solutions, a provider of software products for healthcare organizations and fire departments, disclosed that data belonging to 2.7 million patients has been compromised as a result of a ransomware attack. [...]

title: The password attacks of 2023: Lessons learned and next steps
description: The password attacks of 2023 involved numerous high-profile brands, leading to the exposure of millions of users' data. Learn more from Specops Software on how to respond to these types of attacks. [...]

title: German police takes down Kingdom Market cybercrime marketplace
description: The Federal Criminal Police Office in Germany (BKA) and the internet-crime combating unit of Frankfurt (ZIT) have announced the seizure of Kingdom Market, a dark web marketplace for drugs, cybercrime tools, and fake government IDs. [...]
